headline: Berkshire Buys Nucor Stock. Buffett Will Hope It Works Out Better Than His Last Steel Play.
summary: Hopefully, this purchase works out better than the last time Warren Buffett dabbled in the steel business.  Berkshire purchases often boost stocks.  Shares of the steel maker were rising 6% on Friday to $153 a share, while  and  futures were up 0.2% and 0.7%, respectively.

headline: Warren Buffett Bets On Nucor, UnitedHealth, Housing; Apple Stake Pared
summary: Warren Buffett has added new positions in Nucor and UnitedHealth Group, while shedding more shares of Apple and Bank of America, the quarterly Form 13-F filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission revealed late yesterday.  Buffett also established a new position in homebuilder D.R. Horton, while adding a much bigger stake in Lennar.  Lamar Advertising, another new pickup for Berkshire Hathaway, also rose.
